events.name: EU production and diversification of supply
events.wd_label: EU production and diversification of supply
events.wd_description: Total battery consumption in the EU will almost reach 400 GWh in 2025 (and 4 times more in 2040), driven by use in e-mobility (about 60% of the total capacity in 2025, and 80% in 2040). The EU is expected to expand its production base for battery raw materials and components over 2022-2030, and improve its current position and global share. However, dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.
events.description: Total battery consumption in the EU will almost reach 400 GWh in 2025 (and 4 times more in 2040), driven by use in e-mobility (about 60% of the total capacity in 2025, and 80% in 2040). The EU is expected to expand its production base for battery raw materials and components over 2022-2030, and improve its current position and global share. However, dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.

events.name: EU imports of cobalt and nickel
events.wd_label: EU imports of cobalt and nickel
events.wd_description: The EU will continue to be dependent on imports of cobalt and nickel (concentrates and intermediates) for conversion in its refineries.
events.description: The EU will continue to be dependent on imports of cobalt and nickel (concentrates and intermediates) for conversion in its refineries.

events.name: EU development of new lithium mines
events.wd_label: EU development of new lithium mines
events.wd_description: Most inputs for producing refined lithium compounds will originate from the development of new lithium mines in the EU.
events.description: Most inputs for producing refined lithium compounds will originate from the development of new lithium mines in the EU.

events.name: EU refining of natural graphite
events.wd_description: The refining of natural graphite for anodes will rely on both domestic production and imports.
events.description: The refining of natural graphite for anodes will rely on both domestic production and imports.

events.name: EU development of new supply chains
events.wd_label: EU development of new supply chains
events.wd_description: The EU is expected to diversify its supply chain by developing new sources of battery raw materials and components.
events.description: The EU is expected to diversify its supply chain by developing new sources of battery raw materials and components.

events.name: EU production of battery raw materials and components
events.wd_label: EU production of battery raw materials and components
events.wd_description: The EU will focus on increasing its production of battery raw materials and components to meet the growing demand.
events.description: The EU will focus on increasing its production of battery raw materials and components to meet the growing demand.

events.name: EU improvement in global share
events.wd_description: The EU will improve its current position and global share through the expansion of its production base for battery raw materials and components.
events.description: The EU will improve its current position and global share through the expansion of its production base for battery raw materials and components.

events.name: EU addressing vulnerabilities in supply chain
events.wd_label: EU addressing vulnerabilities in supply chain
events.wd_description: The EU will address the dependencies and bottlenecks in its supply chain to ensure a stable and secure supply of battery raw materials and components.
events.description: The EU will address the dependencies and bottlenecks in its supply chain to ensure a stable and secure supply of battery raw materials and components.
